name: Machina Uncruspare
text: If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon it from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Machina" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Machina Uncruspare". You can only use each effect of "Machina Uncruspare" once per turn.
